website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Post Canyon Mid Waterproof won the hearts of outdoor junkies with its comfortable feel and lightweight design. The boot’s ankle support and minimal break-in period also received positive remarks. On the flip side, the gear’s waterproof liner was unsuccessful against most kinds of wet trail conditions. That being said, this Under Armour product can still be a wise choice for outdoor lovers, granted that their trip won’t involve wading through streams or hiking under unpredictable weather.
pros: Dozens of Under Armour Post Canyon Mid Waterproof owners were impressed with its lightness
This mid-cut hiking boot provided a high level of comfort, as testified by the majority
Several hiking enthusiasts appreciated the ankle support of this gear
Around a handful of consumers were able to break in this boot in no time
A few buyers lauded its grip on wet and dry surfaces
This day hiking boot fits as expected, according to a majority of verified purchasers
cons: A considerable number of hikers complained about the ineffective waterproof liner
A few users were disappointed when the Under Armour Post Canyon Mid Waterproof’s upper mesh panels allowed dirt and debris to enter the boot

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Durable, Tough Boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a hiking trip through Iceland - was totally impressed Walked through a river to get to a waterfall and was totally dry up to my calves. Wearing these boots you forget that they're boots and they feel more like shoes. I drove a SUV with these on and was able to drive manual very comfortably, forgetting I was wearing boots. As someone who usually hates boots this is perfect. I could imagine that with a large pack that it may not be 100% supportive but I can't say without experience. I can say that I love these boots and they are supremely comfortable and very waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: DudemanJenkins

customer_reviews.title: Boots are comfy and seem to be holding up pretty well but they are not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Ive had the boots for over 6 months now. These are my hunting and hiking boots. Boots are comfy and seem to be holding up pretty well but they are not waterproof. They MAY have been waterproof the first month but now just walking through a good stretch of wet grass will get my socks soaked. I have probably put close to 100 hiking miles in these. Other than the water proof issue they are pretty good. I wear a size 12 and they just fit right. I bought these cause they were lightweight and waterproof. Im going to contact Under Armour for a replacement due to them not being waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Utah where there are plenty of trails and plenty of adventure to experience. Currently, it is winter, I have used these twice in very snowy and cold conditions and I can definitely give them an A+ These felt so good on my feet, I am a size 13. These are very versatile boots for pretty much any activity. These are very sturdy and I believe will last for a long time. I will come back in the next coming months with an update.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Deklerk

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots are water resistant but not waterproof, I work outdoors and on days when the grass is wet after a few hours of these boots being soaking wet on the outside (especially on the toe area) I can start to feel it coming through on both feet. This is my first time trying Under Armour boots and will see about how they hold up, I've only had them for a month now and so far so good. I've been wearing KEEN boots that are a bit more comfortable but I would go through a pair about every 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: ttwilber

customer_reviews.title: Glad I heeded warnings in previous reviews and ordered a ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional tread grip and kept my feet dry in snow and while hiking through slot canyons. Glad I heeded warnings in previous reviews and ordered a whole size larger that the 12's I normally wear. As a result, I ended up with size 13's that were a perfect fit. My pair were light and comfortable. People with wide feet might have comfort issues. Overall, a great buy for me!
customer_reviews.author: Marlowe C Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot. Worked 16hrs on my feet with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: MrSvn13

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, his very first pair of UA. He likes the shoelace hooks are plastic so they wont break his laces like his work boots do twice a year. He does not like that the soles come out every time he pulls his feet out of the boots. They look really good, love the brown color. He says they are very comfortable and he is really picky so it must be true. I bought him a size 8 just like he wears in work boots and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TheJodster

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE - very narrow in the toe area!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn size 12M since my teens and that is a long time... I ordered these in size 12 and they were WAY to narrow in the toes. A buddy of mine wears 11.5 so he took the size 12 and ordered me a 13. The size 13 did fit better, however still too narrow in the toes. I wore them for about a month hoping they would stretch/break-in. They did not and I have blisters on both small toes and both feet from being crammed on top of each other!! So with that said, I have a pair of $119 shoes I can not wear.
customer_reviews.author: ttm_9513

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Very Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These things are holding up pretty well. they dont see a whole lot of action from me so i cant attest to how they perform or hold up under hiking and trail conditions but i have two pair. One for work that i wear almost daily. Another (black pair) to flex cause they're that nice! Incredibly comfortable and fit was great. mine are 9. will try and update and post some pics
customer_reviews.author: J. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Not for the AT but you should know that already.
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable hikers. Good ankle support, toe protection, and they seem to breathe decently. May not be suitable for crazy long hikes or for super rough terrain since the soles are not rigid but this does allow them to grip well. I have worn them on hikes of several miles over rough terrain and they have performed decently. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: ... I purchased a half size larger and they fit great. Also have great look and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I purchased a half size larger and they fit great. Also have great look and comfortable. Wore 8 hours straight on outdoor shooting range on gravel, grass, and dirt. Held up great with no discomfort out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Judd

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! I had to return the first pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! I had to return the first pair because I ordered a 10 1/2 (my usual size) and they were small but the 11s fit great. Very much water proof. I did a lot of pressure washing, my pants were soaking wet, but my feet were dry.
customer_reviews.author: John Schuett

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is similar to their shoes
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit a little narrow, luckily my foot isn't very wide. So if you have a wide foot these will not fit. I wear a 9.5 in Under Armour shoes and these fit like their shoes. When I put these on they were comfortable and they didn't need any breaking in. I ordered these a week before I went on a hunting trip and I was able to walk 8 miles comfortably a day. .
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Hiking shoes that look and perform great
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable shoes that could handle the abuse I put them through. Hiked for 5 days on several trails on the North Rim of the Grand Canyon and even kept my feet dry when it rained a little bit. They also survived The Narrows hike which is literally hiking through the Virgin River and these shoes saved my ankles on numerous occasions. Overall great buy and very impressed with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Jose P. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, not much padding.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, not a bad boot. Trekked in Iceland for a week with this boot. Boot is relatively light weight and water resistant (not waterproof), and did a good job gripping terrain. Only negatives are that the boot didn’t have much padding and wasn’t very warm. Otherwise, I would recommend this boot for light trekking in a warmer climate.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Kept feet dry!
customer_reviews.text: I wore them to the shooting range for the first time and while there it rained off and on all day. My feet stayed dry all day. To include stepping into a creek, well over 3” of water, to retrieve one of my targets. I was expecting to feel that first indication that my feet were doomed the rest of the day but it never came! I will be buying another pair soon!
customer_reviews.author: BōssMan

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: Listed as a booth, but they're really just waterproof basketball shoes. Feel great though and they are lightweight. Slick on wet surfaces though. Do not buy if you need traction.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Metz

customer_reviews.title: These fit me almost perfect after putting in a good insole
customer_reviews.text: I have weird feet, I'm a 14 narrow. These fit me almost perfect after putting in a good insole. for the money they are a real good hiker, they don't have the support of a high dollar boot but they are supper lite and I don't feel rocks as I step on them. I don't write reviews very often but I feel these deserve a good word!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof so far. Ive stepped in some big puddles with no issues. Ive been walking outside for 10 hours in the rain with no wet socks or comfort issues.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: nice looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Have not used these boots yet but upon reading the other reviews that said order a half size larger, I did just that. I normally wear a 7.5 and the size 8 fit me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Hoard

customer_reviews.title: They don't  run true to size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run super small will be returning these today..Wont buy another pair on line again ...will just go to the store this time.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Giarmo

customer_reviews.title: A whole size up needed
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear 11 and got these in 12 Beautiful and super comfortable shoes. Definitely waterproof and can walk in them for many hours
customer_reviews.author: GUZZI

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe, pretty comfortable but a little tight in the ball of foot area. I will update once broke in, I have only wore them 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jenea

customer_reviews.title: You will be surprised how good they feel!
customer_reviews.text: They are very light yet very sturdy and lend a lot of support! I am going to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with these shoes....... I came back and changed my star review. Very good looking shoe but after a few months they fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 cents

customer_reviews.title: Tight .
customer_reviews.text: They were tightening and didn't fit me as I expected !
customer_reviews.author: MARICEL MOROSANU

customer_reviews.title: Truly waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Truly waterproof, they are lightweight and comfortable. Husband loved them so much this is the second pair I ordered for him.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy J.

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: A little small I wear a size 11.5 in every pair of under armour shoes and my other pair of boots but these ones were too small and I tried them on wearijng my thinnest socks. Returning today.
customer_reviews.author: CLAYMOR3D

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Light, Comfortable boots. Run VERY Small/Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great Boots, extremely light perfect for trail running. Runs 1/2 size small and extremely narrow. Wish these were available in wide
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, and like most under armour boots, they are absolutely comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: K Baltzer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. Fits just like my other Under Armour shoes does. It keeps water splashes out.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Wren

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are not crazy about these. They seem a bit stiff and run on the smaller side.
customer_reviews.author: NewWoman

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box. Spot on fit. Good ankle support. Haven't gone hiking in them yet but I am sure they will be great.
customer_reviews.author: jacob davis

customer_reviews.title: Love them, wore them to a football game where ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them, wore them to a football game where it was freezing and raining for 3 hours. Stayed dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great boot it’s light weight so at the end of a 10 hour work day I feel great. Very comfortable and I definitely have recommended to other coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: TomD

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a man who loves to hike
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his birthday gift. These were used for hiking and he loved how comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so Good
customer_reviews.text: They run a tad small so I ordered 1/2 size bigger...couldnt be happier. They're comfortable for long periods of time and the waterproofness is a nice bonus
customer_reviews.author: BryanS

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected . A little stiff with no signs of improving. Good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: RAJ

customer_reviews.title: The product seems to be of good quality, but size runs small
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be of good quality, but size runs small. I ordered another pair 1/2 size larger than normal, we will see how they fit. I will return the original pair.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Iv had several ua boots..these are lite duty boots..sharp looking..
customer_reviews.author: Noc

customer_reviews.title: Got what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Got what I was expecting. Looked around at REI and Dick's but had no luck finding a comperable pair that wasn't twice the price. Glad I ordered these!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot but my son's foot was too wide for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane8456.

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 size bigger!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and breathable. Kept my feet dry all day hiking and Im glad I read past reviews and bought 1 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: JAKEfromstatefarm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The overall fit and comfort is a must for someone that works 12 plus hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: daniel w. hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: Order .5 size bigger, perfect, super light,feels like a sneaker, haven’t tested in water. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable boot. I bought a half size larger than normal and it is perfect. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: jack johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable. The 2 hook and cross ties at ankle make it easy on easy off, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 10 medium thinking it would be wide. Shoes are slightly narrow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great and lightweight. Just get 1 size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Larry K.

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Beginners boot for sure. Gets 2 stars for keeping your feet dry and being light. WOULD NOT recommend for a backpacking trip for more than 2 days
customer_reviews.author: ruben vargas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My feet stayed dry for about 9 hours in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: D miller

customer_reviews.title: MY TOES ARE ANGRY😡
customer_reviews.text: They run hella small! Although I wear a true 8, I ordered a size 8 1/2 after reading a review indicating they run small. My toes are balled up like a fist!😞
customer_reviews.author: ConsciousCat

customer_reviews.title: When I put them on, they felt tighter than ...
customer_reviews.text: When I put them on, they felt tighter than previous UA boots I have purchased. But after a few hours they broke in well. To early to rate longevity, but just a heads up so you don't panic about fit.
customer_reviews.author: joe cartia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty water proof
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not water proof, but they are close enough for me. Good price, and great quality. This is the first pair of Under Armour boots I have owned, but I will order more. Hope the quality continues!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Post Canyon Mid Waterproof Hiking Boot, (001)/Black, 9
feature_bullets: Tight weave textile & suede upper for lightweight durability
UA Storm repels water without sacrificing breathability
Scratch rubber toe cap & heel overlay for increased protection in crucial areas
Lightweight EVA midsole provides optimal cushioning
Built in EES plate for push through protections
